triples.name: Software agent
triples.relevance: The paper addresses automated testing of agent systems built using software agent technology.

triples.name: Unit testing
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an automated framework for comprehensive unit testing of agent systems.

triples.name: Model-based testing
triples.relevance: The testing approach follows the principle of model-based testing using design descriptors.

triples.name: Agent-oriented software engineering
triples.relevance: The testing framework is based on AOSE design descriptors for specifying agent system units.

triples.name: Test case
triples.relevance: The paper develops an algorithm for automatic generation of comprehensive test case inputs.

triples.name: Software engineering
triples.relevance: The work applies software engineering principles and practices to automated agent system testing.

triples.name: Fault model
triples.relevance: The paper develops a novel fault model describing possible problems in different kinds of agent system units.
